page.title: 18Heaton Cricket Club
page.content:
Every Friday at 6.30pm my Dad goes round to my friend's house to pick up my friends to go to{Heaton Cricket {Club}on{Church Road.}When we get there we are split up. I go to the under 13's group and the rest of my friends go to the under 11's group. There is also an under 9's group. At Heaton there are{five}teams, the Under 13's the Under 15's and the Under 18's first, second and third teams.
On Friday it is only a{practice.}On Sunday at 9.30am the Under 13's play. I play on the Under 13's team. I have played five out of a possible six matches. On Friday we have{three {coaches}and a few helpers and about one hundred boys on Heaton Cricket Club pitch.{Membership for a Junior {and Normal member is Â£2.00
